resources.string: Jagannath University (JnU) jagannātha biśbabidyālaẏa, University Acrostic : (JnU) is a state-funded public university at 9-10, Chittaranjan Avenue in Sadarghat, Dhaka, the capital of Bangladesh. Even though it is one of the most famous and academically one of the best universities in Bangladesh, JnU is the only non-residential University in this country Jagannath University is in the southern part of Dhaka city near the River Buriganga and a new super modern campus of approximately 200 acres is being built at Keraniganj.
